Text:
To all my fellow Tolkien lovers out there, I would love to connect with other collectors who would like to trade miscellaneous finds from around the net. I have a decent collection, most of which was found on torrent sites and some P2P networks. There are items I'm missing though that maybe others have.

Also, as I'm sure many are, I'm looking forward to an update to the Tolkien Text Anthology (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4967133/Tolkien_Text_Anthology_2_Extended_Edition__), anybody have any info on that?
How "to connect with other collectors"? Is there a way to communicate besides these comments?

Bladorthin,
I don't know of a very anonymous way at the present for Tolkien collectors to connect and share. It's something I'm looking for. I'm open to any and all ideas.
???

I've created this thread, http://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=72617, on the suprbay forum, which seems to be the official forum of The Pirate Bay. It might be a place where Tolkien collectors might share ideas and connect.

I've created a thread on the suprbay forum called Tolkien Collectors, which seems to be the official forum of The Pirate Bay. It might be a place where Tolkien collectors might share ideas and connect.
